name: Godzilla: Strike Zone
description: Join a squadron of military heroes on a dangerous mission to face the ultimate force of nature: GODZILLA. Experience the breathtaking high-altitude sky jump from the movie as you air-drop into a devastated San Francisco and embark on a series of first-person rescue missions to evacuate survivors before it&#39;s too late. Your courage has never been more needed than it is today. See GODZILLA in theaters May 16.
